Depends on what you consider fun. Some might thing carrying around more than they'll ever own in cost on their back in the form of heavy government ordinance as being fun. Like, fuck. To some twenty-somethings there's no deep philosophy needed to be in the army, you just want to carry around a rocket launcher that's as expensive as two Mercedez-Benz on your back and to fire it's house-expensive explosive rounds.

topics.body:
This is an idea that an asshole came up with, but goddamn if it isn't satisfying. When I get junk mail, I don't just throw it away. I'm talking here about shit like credit card offers and other things where it is bullshit assholes trying to convince me to go deeper into debt or something else of that nature.

What I do is I take the business reply envelope, and I put coupons in it. You know, the other great bit of junk mail everyone gets and then I send it back.

Gives me a nice little vindictive thrill.
topics.author: 4f41ee04945b701c41002af7
